attributes.action: restrict immigration into the UK, this small overcrowded country, which is resulting in the lack of proper housing, NHS treatment, including dentists, schools and many more services which would otherwise be available to the citizens of this little island. THERE IS JUST NOT ENOUGH ROOM!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is not much point in elaborating on the point of this petition, except to point out what we all know, and that is that the recent terrible floods have been largely brought about by building property on floodplanes which once acted as a "sponge" to soak up excess water. 
This is only one of many results of having too many people here.
